name: The Fan
description: Historic neighborhood known for Victorian architecture and vibrant street life

name: Carytown

description: Historic district with cobblestone streets and nightlife

description: Richmond's oldest neighborhood with historic sites and city views

description: Historic African American neighborhood, birthplace of Black capitalism

description: Close-knit community overlooking Hollywood Cemetery and the James River
